titleStmt.title: At the council-chambers in Whitehall Monday the 22 of October, 1688.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Privy Council.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Charles Bill, Henry Hills and Thomas Newcomb ...,

notesStmt.note: A series of depositions purporting to have witnessed the birth of the Old Pretender.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
